description: [HermeticWizard](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0698) can use WMI to create a new process on a remote machine via `C:\windows\system32\cmd.exe /c start C:\windows\system32\\regsvr32.exe /s /iC:\windows\<filename>.dll`.(Citation: ESET Hermetic Wizard March 2022)

external_references.description: ESET. (2022, March 1). IsaacWiper and HermeticWizard: New wiper and worm targetingUkraine. Retrieved April 10, 2022.
